history.proof: unfold minus, opp, zero. rewrite plus_opp_r. qsimpl use: plus_zero_r.

exceptions.exn: In environment G : AbelianGroup x : G Unable to unify "plus ?M2421 zero = ?M2421" with "zero = AbelianGroup.zero G (AbelianGroup.class G)".

original: unfold minus, opp, zero. rewrite plus_opp_r. apply plus_zero_r.
